<title level="1" right="Rules">[Skill Abilities](/Rules.aspx?ID=1037)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 69</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A skilled creature might have abilities related to its skills. The skill feats in the _Core Rulebook_ make for a good baseline. Avoid giving your creature skill abilities that won’t matter in its interactions with PCs.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
